actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Pacific Northwest Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the National Trails System Act, a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Pacific Northwest Trail in Idaho, Montana, and Washington as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Pacific Northwest Trail as a national scenic trail.
